duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the structuring of deals, oversee bid management, support complex value propositions and offerings, conduct business modeling, and collaborate with sales teams.
Collaborate with sales teams to understand customer needs and strategic priorities, identify partnership opportunities, and drive solution design.
Manage cross-functional, matrixed deal teams and act as a liaison between various stakeholders for effective decision making, deal approvals, and execution.
Conduct business modeling to assess the economic viability of proposed deals or new commercial approaches, influencing customer and internal stakeholders towards most viable solutions.

education_certification.credential: Minimum 10 years experience in the healthcare/medtech industry, with a background in business development, financial services (commercial), due diligence and transactions (M&A), private equity or investment banking.
Masters' degree, MBA, or other advanced degree in business, finance, or related field preferred (or equivalent knowledge and experience).
